⚠️ PULL REQUESTS ARE DISABLED ⚠️

Thank you for taking the time to open a pull request.

Unfortunately, due to limited time and resources, I am not able to properly review, test, and analyze incoming changes.  
For this reason, all pull requests will be automatically closed.

I hope you understand — this is not a reflection on the quality or value of your contribution.

If you need to make changes or extend the functionality, please feel free to:
- fork this repository,
- create your own version or component,
- and maintain it independently.

Thank you for your interest and understanding.
